subject: Testcases named 'unknown' in JUnit reports
msgSnippet: Hi, I m a newbie trying to run my unit tests and generate test reports from ant. All my testcases seem to run just fine and pass, but for some reason, they end
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm a newbie trying to run my unit tests and generate test reports
from ant. All my testcases seem to run just fine and pass, but for
some reason, they end up as 'unknown' in the JUnit reports! For
instance, the XML contains data like this:

<testcase classname="junit.framework.JUnit4TestCaseFacade"
name="unknown" time="0.031" />

Any thoughts as to what I'm doing wrong?

I'm using (trying to use) JUnit 4.1 and ant 1.6.5 on a Windows box.

Thanks,
Einar
